    OMSCS Program Overview

    Collection of projects and courses that I’ve taken through Georgia Tech’s online Computer Science Master’s program.

    Spring 2020

    CS 6476 - Computer Vision

    Projects

    • OpenCV and Augmented Reality
    • Particle Filters and Mitt Romney
    • Motion History Images for Activity Recognition

    CS 8803 - AI for Robotics (now CS 7638)

    Projects

    • Kalman Filters for Tracking

    Fall 2020

    CS 7637 - Knowledge-Based AI

    Projects

    • An AI Agent for Solving Raven’s Progressive Matrices

    Spring 2020

    CS 6300 - Software Development Process

    Projects

    • Building an Android App

    CS 6601 - Artificial Intelligence

    Projects

    • Classification with Decision Trees
    • Game Playing with Minimax
    • Searching with A*

    Summer 2020

    CS 7646 - Machine Learning for Trading

    Projects

    • Stock Indicators for Trading
    • Trading with Machine Learning

    Fall 2020

    CS 6475 - Computational Photography

    Projects

    • Content Aware Image Resizing
    • Generating Panoramas
    • Auto-Directed Video Stabilization

    CS 7639 - Cyber-Physical Design and Analysis

    Projects

    • Trajectory Planning with Constraints
    • Component Selection and Optimization with Python

    Spring 2021

    CS 6750 - Human-Computer Interaction

    Projects

    • Maps.me Application Interface Redesign

    CS 6515 - Intro to Graduate Algorithms

    Projects

    Algorithm Design and Analysis covering:

    • Dynamic Programming
    • Divide and Conquer Approaches
    • Graph Techniques
    • NP Reductions
    • RSA Cryptography and Modular Math
    • Linear Programming
